text.text: Canada Silver Cobalt Works is a dual-focus precious metals and battery metals junior mining company with a valuable portfolio of critical energy metals projects located in some of the safest and environmentally stringent jurisdictions in the world: Northern Ontario and Northern Quebec in Canada.
High-grade Silver: for solar panels, consumer technology, and electric vehicles.
Battery Metals deposits: Nickel and Cobalt for batteries and Copper for wiring needed in electrical grids.
Re-2Ox processing technology: to convert various mined or recycled metals into nickel and cobalt sulphates needed by battery manufacturers without any emissions.
